Stubborn frequency

l participated in the tumbler designing project,using CAD to do the prototype of tumbler.What unique about this tumbler is it can be use d to teach student physic's knowledge.The backend of tumbler has many Symmetrical holes,students can put sticks into these holes.The positions where students put sticks into these holes are one of the factors which will impact the number of swings of a tumbler,because it will change the position of the center of gravity of the tumblers.By playing this toy,students can learn the knowledge of gravity better.
